Network systems and data analysts, and medical scientists are the fastest growing occupations, but, despite the focus on`` knowledge'' jobs, the great majority of job openings will be in the low tech, non-professional positions, in jobs such as personal and home care aides, retail salespersons, cashiers, waiters and waitresses, and food preparation workers, Michael Bernick concludes.`` It may be time that our California workforce system gives these jobs greater consideration.''( http://sfg.ly/eXj0J3).
